title: Eatme Food Delivery
description: Eatme is a personal project. It's a food delivery service, it is made using frontend framework ReactJs and state management system Redux. In the backend I use NodeJs, Express, Squelize. I use SqlDB for my Database.

title: Don Ruent's Pizza
description: DonRuentPizza is a personal project. It's a user-friendly web-based pizza ordering system, crafted using Typescript, React / Next.js 13, Redux, and Tailwind CSS.
